caseTitle: Raja Amer Khan and another v. The Federation of Pakistan through the Secretary Law and Justice Division, Ministry of Law and Justice Islamabad and others
authorJudge: Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah
tagline: Concurring note, endorsed by a majority of the Bench, on the constitutionality of the Supreme Court (Practice and Procedure) Act 2023, explaining: (i) meaning of the phrase "subject to law" used in Article 191; (ii) scope of entries 55 and 58 of the Federal Legislative List, (iii) separation of powers vis-a-vis checks and balances, (iv) scope of Section 3 of the Act, and (v) status of benches constituted and decisions made by them during the suspension of the Act.
